div.div: School cancelled for the remainder of the school year due to COVID-19. See this website and the new Pattonsburg RII School District Facebook page for updates and notices.

div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 15:52 pm CDT

div.span: Mostly sunny, with a high near 69. South southwest wind around 5 mph.

A chance of rain and thunderstorms before 2am, then showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm between 2am and 5am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms after 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. South southeast wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.

A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then a chance of rain and thunderstorms between 7am and 10am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 74. South southeast wind 10 to 15 mph becoming southwest in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.

div.p: I would like to take a few moments to update the community on the happenings of the Pattonsburg School District. Last week the Governor signed an executive order closing schools for the remainder of the school calendar year. This effectively closes our district until May 13th. Our teachers will continue to educate our children through online devices and packets.
We are still looking at options to have a graduation and prom at a later date. Our seniors deserve to be recognized for their accomplishments and we will do everything we can to do so.
Our lunch program will continue as we have through May 13th. Lunches/breakfast will be available for pick-up Monday through Thursday from 12 to 1.

At our regular Board meeting on March 31st, the Board approved, unanimously, the 4-day school calendar. We needed to have a calendar approved for next year. Under normal circumstances, we would have liked to have had a forum to hear from the community. As the situation stands, the decision was made due to the overwhelming support for this calendar from the surveys. More information will follow on this matter.
Thank you once again to the community for your patience as we navigate this unforeseen situation. Thank you for what you do for your children.
